column4: I am setting up an Ubuntu 6.06 LAMP server, and want to be able to use OpenOffice.org and Inkscape from the command line (which requires me to install X)  should I install X, or just start over with a standard desktop install and add Apache, PHP , and MySQL?
No need at all to start over, just install the additional packages you need, including X.
thanks, I just wanted to make sure there wasn't a reason to avoid that approach
As far as I'm aware they're just different sets of initially installed packages.
